snippet: Negotiations between the president and Congressional Republicans hinge on a concept outlined in a book called “Getting to Yes.”
abstract: Robert H Frank Economic View column contends budget and taxation negotiations between Pres Obama and Congressional Republicans hinge on concept outlined in book called 'Getting to Yes'; points out concept is the best alternative to negotiated agreement, or Batna, and knowing your true Batna and your adversary's is critical in bargaining.
lead_paragraph: Negotiations between the president and Congressional Republicans hinge on a concept outlined in a book called “Getting to Yes.”

headline.print_headline: In Talks, G.O.P. May Have To Just Say Yes
headline.seo: ‘Getting to Yes’ Offers Clues to Fiscal Talks
headline.main: In Talks, G.O.P. May Have to Just Say Yes
